data.scheme_name: Assistance Scheme for Handicraft Artisans (ASHA) - For General category (Female Entrepreneurs) - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides fixed capital invetsment assistance of upto Rs 4.5 lakhs and working capital assistance of upto Rs 3 lakhs.
data.eligibility: All existing micro enterprises in the handicraft sector are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Units must have Udyam Registration or any other registration specified by the Ministry of MSME, Govt. of India. 
  2. Enterprises must be set up within the State. 
  3. Units must invested in plant and machinery for a running handicraft unit.
data.beneficiaries: All existing micro enterprises in the handicraft sector are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Units must have Udyam Registration or any other registration specified by the Ministry of MSME, Govt. of India. 
  2. Enterprises must be set up within the State. 
  3. Units must invested in plant and machinery for a running handicraft unit.
data.context: The Assistance Scheme for Handicrafts Artisans (ASHA) replaced the existing Scheme 'Entrepreneur Assistance Scheme in Handicrafts' and aims to bring the artisans in the handicrafts sector under the ambit of a Single Scheme for availing financial assistance in the form of grant assistance for setting up handicraft enterprises.
data.objective: The scheme aims to provide extensive Support to Artisans in the Handicrafts Sector for setting up Handicrafts-based micro enterprises.
data.description:
Scheme provides fixed capital investment assistance and working capital assistance as given below: 

  • Fixed Capital Investment Assistance: 50% of fixed capital investment, Maximum Rs. 4.5 Lakhs
  • Working Capital Assistance: 50% of working capital requirement as per project report, Maximum Rs. 3 Lakhs 
  • Total Assistance: Fixed capital + Working capital combined Maximum of Rs. 7.5 Lakhs
data.how_to_apply: Application can be submitted online through the Official website of the Directorate of Industries: https://industry.kerala.gov.in/index.php/schemes-mainmenu/asha-schemes
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit in their bank account after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate
Copy of Caste Certificate (Attested by Gazetted Officer)
Self-attested copy of the identity card of the applicant
Self-attested copy of the resolution
Self-attested copy of Project Report
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Directorate of Industries Commerce, Vikas Bhavan P.O,Thiruvananthapuram Kerala 695033
Email : industriesdirectorate@gmail.com
Call : +91- 471-2302774
